name.description: Name of scylla instances as seen in DC/OS.

nodes.description: How many nodes the cluster will have in total

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each service instance.

mem.description: Memory in Mb to allocate to each service instance.

Overprovisioned.description: Choose if you want to run in an overprovisioned environment.

Experimental.description: Run with experimental settings or not (not recommended for production).

Use host disks.description: Use disks on host. Should be formatted as XFS and have the same path on all nodes

Data file directories.description: Path on host to use for data storage. Comma-separate if you have more than one per host. [/mnt/scylla/data1,/mnt/scylla/data2,...]

commitlog_directories.description: Path on host to use for commitlog

Use DC/OS local persistance.description: See DC/OS documentation for more information

Local persistance size.description: Size of local volume in Mb
